refnamediv.refpurpose: Using Ruby code to extend Virtuoso.

refsect1.title: Overview
refsect1.para: The following tutorial demonstrates how Virtuoso can be extended through the use of Ruby.
The demonstrations in this section highlight transparent integration (hosting) between Virtuoso and the Ruby Runtime.

refsect1.title: Prerequisites
refsect1.para: The following prerequisites ensure the usability of these tutorial demos on any platform with a Ruby runtime:

itemizedlist.listitem: Ruby should be compiled to have libruby.1.8 as a shared object
Virtuoso Universal Server with Ruby Runtime Hosting module
